sub_title: Director of Open Innovation & External Partnerships/ Head of Fuji Oil Global Innovation Center Europe
summary:
My strong networking and relationship-building skills are used to initiate and facilitate successful R&D partnerships that create new business opportunities. 
I have a strong scientific understanding and am skilled at communicating complex scientific concepts to non-experts. 
I have extensive international and cross-cultural commercial experience, particularly in Asia Pacific, and am multi-lingual (fluent in Japanese). 


I identify opportunties,  initiate and facilitate  relationships that result in contracting and/or collaboration in commercially-focused R&D.

I have international experience in Europe and Asia Pacific and am adept at working with cross-functional and cross-cultural and virtual  teams.

Specialties:
Significant R&D experience in industry and academia: molecular biology, microbiology, fermentation
Industries: brewing, confectionery, food ingredients, life sciences, contract research
Open innovation
Technology scouting
New business development
Supply chain – international trade, purchasing
contract negotiation
Leading and facilitating cross-functional and international teams/ virtual teams
Fluent in technical & business Japanese
Intermediate proficiency in Korean
Native English speaker
